name: garanti-payment-module
author: kahvedigital

sections.description: garanti woocommerce is the simple and lightweight implementation of garanti.com payment service for woocommerce+. It’s licensed under LGPL v3.0 license, therefore feel free to use it in any project or modify the source code.
sections.installation:
Installation

Login your WordPress admin and navigate to Plugins->Installed Plugins

Find the garanti plugin and activate the module.

After the successful activation of module, navigate to “Woocommerce->settings->Checkout and click garanti payment.

Check the “Enable garanti payment”

Define a title and description for module.

Click Save Changes button then users are ready to pay.

Users will see garanti payment gateway option on their checkout page.

Admin can see order detail under woocommerce menu.

Notice :

If you have installed any other theme on your woocommerce site, you have to copy below folder from this plugin: wp-content/plugin.

For further information please refer to garanti developer portal.
